titles: A new family-book, or, The true interest of families being directions to parents and children, and to those who are instead of parents : shewing them their several duties, and how they may be happy in one another : together with several prayers for families and children, and graces before and after meat : to which is annexed a discourse about the right way of improving our time / by James Kirkwood ... ; with a preface, by Dr. Horneck.
author: Kirkwood, James, 1650?-1709.
Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.
publisher: Printed for J. Taylor ..., and J. Everingham ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Parent and child --  Early works to 1800.
